reviewText: I received my movie quickly, it was used but had no scratches at all! Im very pleased.  No complaints here thanks
TO ME IT TOLD A STORY OF REAL LIFE
Although fictional, this movie gave me an insight into the lives of ordinary urban South Africans. The movie was well produced.
A brilliant work of post-apartheid South Africa as young clever boy made it up socially by robbery and murdering less lucky contestants.
really good movie and very inspirational which i didn't expect from a gangster flick
Film details the highjacking of buildings in Johannesburg.  This could likely be the future in America with the sort of economy that exists now coupled with the low character of political leadership.

Movie came faster than I expected! Clean disc played well. The movie starts off a little dry the first 15 minutes, but after that it kept my interest the whole time! It is a must-see it's great!! Reminds me of a american movie. Interesting to see how they do it in South Africa love it!

Learned alot from this movie. If anyone wants to know how other countries and people survive, this will do it for South Africa. Leaders and followers and others that take advantage of the situations. Could find no fault in any of the cases.

Pretty cool how the dude comes from rags to riches by helping out ghetto inhabitants by establishing a trust and withholding everyones rent from the landlords until the building goes into foreclosure, then he buys it and charges the tenants a lower rate so they all love him.

Resorts to shooting and violence only when drugs and criminals threaten his neighborhoods, good movie but wouldn't watch it over and over.
Excellent movie! It is nice to see foreign movies, particularly, from developing countries in sub-Saharan Africa. The acting was very realistic.
One of the best South Africa productions. The movie is incredible and amazing. Highly recommended for the people that like action movie, and especially for those who want Hollywood-way.
The movie is real interesting. I am an african in the USA and I enjoy watching different movies.  The movie reminds me of home and I really enjoyed and will highly recommend it.

Gangsters Paradise: Jerusalema does not present the people of Azania (South Africa) at their best but it does give insight into the way poverty promotes crime, and the way the Azania masses are still suffering from the effect of apartheid. Excellent movie, acting, production values and theme.
South African cinema has a few great deliveries, like the Gods Must be Crazy, Sector 9 and Jerusalema. An outstanding film.
Its a great movie. I recommend

Good movie

Overall good movie based on actual events. Would love to see more movies with blacks becoming successful and less movies of them being depicted as low class, unintelligent, under achievers (SO UNTRUE!).
My only dislike about this movie - I'm sick of seeing ninjas chasing bunnies every time they come into money.
United we stand. Divided we fall.
good but not as good as city of men!
